problem_text: If J, P, and L are the midpoints of K H, H M and M K, respectively. Find x.
compact_text: If J, P, and L are the midpoints of KH, HM and MK, respectively. Find x.
annotat_text: If $J,P,$ and $L$ are the midpoints of $\overline{KH}, \overline{HM}$ and $\overline{MK}$, respectively. Find $x$.
